column1: Improving Hypernymy Prediction via Taxonomy Enhanced Adversarial Learning
AAAI Technical Track: Natural Language Processing
Hypernymy is a basic semantic relation in computational linguistics that expresses the “is-a” relation between a generic concept and its specific instances
column2: serving as the backbone in taxonomies and ontologies. Although several NLP tasks related to hypernymy prediction have been extensively addressed
column3: few methods have fully exploited the large number of hypernymy relations in Web-scale taxonomies.
